snippet.title: TI-99/4A's Tombstone City 21st Century Gameplay
snippet.description:
One of my favorite games on the TI-99/4A computer.  "Your survival instinct is challenged immediately as you find yourself in a 21st Century Old West ghost town threatened by an invading horde of green alien monsters."
"The object of the game is to score as many points as possible, while eliminating generating pairs of saguaros (cactus, cacti).  If a missile hits a morg (green enemy) next to two adjacent saguaros, these saguaros instantly become one additional morg, so be ready to fire again!."
